org.dsa.iot.dslink

Class DSLinkProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.DSLinkProvider

  • public class DSLinkProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides DSLinks as soon as a client connects to the server or vice versa.

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        Blocks the thread indefinitely while the endpoint is active or connected to a host. This will automatically unblock when the endpoint becomes inactive or disconnects, allowing the thread to proceed execution. Typical usage is to call sleep in the main thread to prevent the application from terminating abnormally.
